body.p: You can restrict the use of the PDF files by specifying a set of permissions. For example, you may want to set a password on the document, restrict the available actions inside the PDF reader, or encrypt the PDF content.
The pdf.security.* parameters listed in the section can be used for this purpose.
You can also sign your PDF files to ensure their authenticity and their integrity.
